message.body: Did you do any reading for the sacred texts class yet
Yeah I did all of them
I'm like halfway through. They are a little confusing
Yeah they're really confusing.. Haha. And it's so much reading. We should talk to her about it
Yeah I emailed her and she said things will really be clarified in class. It would probably be fine if you just skimmed the readings beforehand
Hmmm alright. She's giving way too much reading already haha
